alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 22 at 9:54AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Tahquamenon River near Paradise affecting Luce County. .Light rain and snow melt will continue high runoff. Flows in rivers will continue to remain high. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by rain and snowmelt continue. * WHERE...Tahquamenon River near Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The river exceeds bankfull stage * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Sunday afternoon at 200 PM EDT.
